scripts.build:all: bun build ./index.ts --compile --target=bun-darwin-arm64 --outfile dist/sauna-darwin-arm64 && bun build ./index.ts --compile --target=bun-darwin-x64 --outfile dist/sauna-darwin-x64 && bun build ./index.ts --compile --target=bun-linux-x64 --outfile dist/sauna-linux-x64 && bun build ./index.ts --compile --target=bun-linux-arm64 --outfile dist/sauna-linux-arm64 && bun build ./index.ts --compile --target=bun-windows-x64 --outfile dist/sauna-windows-x64.exe
